trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: The Stranger wears an invisible {@item ring of mind shielding} that thwarts magical attempts to read their thoughts. The Stranger also wears {@item dimensional shackles} but is eager to be rid of them. One touch from Omid's mace-key causes the shackles to fall off, freeing the Stranger.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
